name: Cowboy Shootout
overview: A simple western shoot out, mano y mano with a covered wagon to take cover behind. Published in the book "Commodore 64 Games Book". Shoot the computer-controlled cowboy as many times as you can without him shooting you. As you shoot it out you have to avoid the wagons passing between you. You can’t shoot through them. Your controls are: ‘W’ for up ‘X‘ for down ‘S’ to fire You’re on the left, the computer is on the right. Straight shooting!
